caseTitle: Rahimullah Khan v. Deputy Postmaster General, Southern Postal Region, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Fundamental Rule 54 (b) (2) The "Revising Authority" or "Authorised Officer" under Rule 2 of the Government Servants (Efficiency and Discipline) Rules, 1973 (3) The principle of “no work, no pay” (4) Under Article 417-A of C.S.R., the pending disciplinary proceeding is abated if the officer is retired before the completion of the inquiry.
